div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1315 Karini, Lesbos, 1888 (534, 721) Burial: c. 250-200 B.C. (Newell) Contents: c. 300 AE Mytilene (as BMC 96 ff.) Disposition: New York 121 BMCTroas, p. 192, note â€ Newell, NNM 68 (1935), pp. 34-42, illus. The combination of the two Noe entries was already suggested by Newell (pp. 41 f.)
